name: swarm

effect.sun-moon: Increases the frequency of cries heard on the overworld if any party Pokémon has this ability.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Increases the frequency of cries heard on the overworld if any party Pokémon has this ability.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Increases the frequency of cries heard on the overworld if any party Pokémon has this ability.

short_effect: Strengthens bug moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.

flavor_text.sun-moon: Powers up Bug-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Powers up Bug-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Powers up Bug-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.
